chapter.title: Soft delete
chapter.p: Soft delete cards from a project by using a deleted card status.

topic.title: Create property status for all cards and use a transition to 'soft delete' a card

steps.item: Create a card property called 'status' which is available to all card types
Create a transition to 'Soft delete' cards which changes status to Deleted. Use this to remove cards from a project and yet maintain them for history
